author: Naylus
title: First Duplo Car
review:
This Truck was one of the first sets in my collection, bought back in 1980s when I was very little. As a kid I had a lot of fun playing with it, as I got more Duplo blocks, and is easily combined with Lego System bricks later.

General Overview
As with other small Duplo sets, this one isn't rich in details, but serves well as an addition to a Duplo town, if a child wants to make a larger community. It has the yellow base car, which can be combined with other blocks, the red dumper bucket to transport the cargo, the driver in a construction hat, two blue bricks and a grey shovel.

Playability
The yellow base is probably the best thing to start with, if you add bricks from other sets. It's possible to add a cabin in the back or create a small bus. It can also serve as a main car to attach base cars with open hitch ends for instance to make sort of a large train. Lego Basic bricks can also be added into the driver's seat to make a peculiar transport like in Time Cruisers or Lego Movie series.
